text.div:
BC ExceptionValueVS ValueSet

Reasons that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing. Extended set based on http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-valueabsentreason

name: ExceptionValueVS
title: BC ExceptionValueVS ValueSet
publisher: The HL7 Cancer Interoperability Group sponsored by Clinical Interoperability Council Work Group (CIC)
description: Reasons that a value associated with a test or other finding is missing. Extended set based on http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/observation-valueabsentreason

concept.display: Human source was asked but declined to respond to the question, or an applicable question was left unanswered.
The reason the information is not present is not known.
The answer is missing because nothing of a type of thing is known to exists, e.g., the siblings of an only child. Also use this code to represent a 'none of the above' answer
Missing due to a problem collecting, identifying, or locating the specimen, including patient refusal or unable to provide specimen
Missing due to a problem with the specimen, e.g. inadequate specimen, contamination, clotting, improper tube type, improper storage, too small, etc.
